name: Deer Wild Sniper Shoot
description:
Deer Wild Sniper Shoot is full of shooting actions game.If you are passionate for shooting and hunting, then wait is over.Lets start hunting dear in jungle by using the sniper shooting skills.Those who love hunting will love this first person sniper shooting game.Grab your gun, test your sniper skills and don't let the deer escape. Let’s go hunting in the Realistic jungle wild environment.

Features:

• First person jungle sniper hunting.
• Smooth and efficient weapon control.
• Realistic animal and deer hunting games graphics.
• World’s most advanced sniper with accurate scope focus and magazine.
• Realistic 3D environment of beautiful woodland.
• Ultra High definition (HD) display.
• Smooth controllers.
• Mission based gameplay to complete all missions.
